entry.tran: 公开地；公然地；未加隐瞒地；坦率地
entry.def: If you do something openly, you do it without hiding any facts or hiding your feelings.

example.ex: We can now talk openly about AIDS which we couldn't before...
example.tran: 现在我们能公开谈论以前讳言不提的艾滋病问题。

example.ex: The Bundesbank has openly criticised the German Government...
example.tran: 德国中央银行公开批评德国政府。
